p: Ribavirin inhibits multiple viruses in vitro. Among the susceptible DNA viruses are herpesviruses, adenoviruses, and poxviruses. Susceptible RNA viruses include HCV, Lassa virus, influenza, parainfluenza, measles, mumps, RSV, and HIV. However, no correlation has been found between ribavirinâ€™s in vitro activity and its activity against human infections.
